text:
Edvard Johannes Brost Forssell (25 September 1946 – 4 January 2018) was a Swedish actor and comedian. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden. He was known for his role as Joker the bartender in the TV soap opera "Rederiet". Brost has also starred as a villain in two "Jönssonligan" movies.
Brost died from complications of pancreatic cancer on 4 January 2018 in Lund at the age of 71.
